Name: If a friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS model is slain within 1" of an enemy unit, before removing that model from play, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a number of dice equal to the Wounds characteristic of that slain model. Add 1 to the number of dice you roll if the slain model has the THUNDERSTRIKE keyword. For each 6+, the target suffers 1 mortal wound at the end of that phase.
